00024 #if defined(APOXI_RTOS_WIN32)

00029 class InternalTracer {
00030     public:
00032         enum TraceMask {
00033             Always  = 0x0000,
00034             Adc     = 0x0001,
00035             Apc     = 0x0002,
00036             Asc     = 0x0004,
00037             Aux     = 0x0008,
00038             Gui     = 0x0010,
00039             Kernel  = 0x0020,
00040             Socket  = 0x0040,
00041             Mmi     = 0x0080,
00042             App1    = 0x0100,
00043             App2    = 0x0200,
00044             App3    = 0x0400,
00045             App4    = 0x0800,
00046                 
00047             Mem     = 0x1000,
00048             Func    = 0x2000,
00049             Obj     = 0x4000,
00050             Data    = -32768,   // 0x8000
00051                 
00052 #if defined(APOXI_TRACE_MEM)
00053             DefaultMask = Mem
00054 #else
00055             DefaultMask = 0xFFF | Func | Obj | Data
00056 #endif
00057         };
00058         
00060         enum TraceId {
00061             Unknown         = 0x0000,
00062             UChar           = 0x0003,
00063             ULong           = 0x0007,
00064             String          = 0x000e,
00065             Int             = 0x0010,
00066             UInt            = 0x0012,
00067             Char            = 0x0013,
00068             Long            = 0x0014,
00069             Short           = 0x0015,
00070             UShort          = 0x0016,
00071             WString         = 0x001E,
00072                 
00073             TestState       = 0x00E0,
00074             New             = 0x00F0,
00075             Delete          = 0x00F1,
00076             AppBegin        = 0x00F2,
00077             AppEnd          = 0x00F3,
00078             ObjectCreate    = 0x00F4,
00079             ObjectDestroy   = 0x00F5,
00080             DataTrace       = 0x00F6,
00081             Misc            = 0x00F7,
00082             Message         = 0x00F8,
00083             Version         = 0x00F9,
00084             Warning         = 0x00FA,
00085             FunctionBegin   = 0x00FB,
00086             CheckPoint      = 0x00FC,
00087             FuncStackTrace  = 0x00FD,
00088             FunctionEnd     = 0x00FE,
00089             Error           = 0x00FF
00090         };
00091         
00093         enum {
00094             APP_NAME_LENGTH = 20,
00095             STACK_TRACE_DEPTH = 10,
00096             MAX_DATA_LENGTH = 400
00097         };
00098         
00100         struct TsStruct {
00101             UINT32 ts;
00102         };
00103 
00105         struct TraceHeader {
00106             UINT16 id;          // id, type
00107             UINT8 nestedLevel;  //
00108             UINT8 appId;        // application id, provided by apoxi
00109             TsStruct ts;            // timestamp
00110             const void* codeAdr;  
00111         };
00112 
00114         static void SetGlobalTraceMask(TraceMask mask) {
00115             g_globalMask = mask;
00116         }
00117         
00119         static TraceMask GetGlobalTraceMask() {
00120             return g_globalMask;
00121         }
00122         
00124         static void Init();
00126         static void TraceMiscData      (TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg, const void* data, UINT16 len);
00128         static void TraceData          (TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg, const void* data, UINT16 len);
00130         static void TraceData          (TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg, TraceId id, const void* data, UINT16 len);
00132         static void TraceFuncBegin     (TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg, const void* this_ptr);
00134         static void TraceFuncCheckPoint(TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg);
00136         static void TraceFuncStackTrace(TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg);
00138         static void TraceFuncEnd       (TraceMask mask, const void* linkreg);
00140         static void TraceNew      (const void* linkreg, const void* ptr, UINT16 size);
00142         static void TraceDelete   (const void* linkreg, const void* ptr);
00144         static void TraceMessage  (const void* linkreg, UINT16 id, const void* ptr, UINT16 size);
00146         static void TraceBuffer   (const void* linkreg, UINT16 id, const void* str, UINT16 size);
00148         static void TraceAppAttach(const void* linkreg, const void* app, const void* container, 
00149                                                         const WCHAR* appName, UINT8 newAppId);
00151         static void TraceAppDetach(const void* linkreg, const void* app, UINT8 newAppId);
00153         static void TraceObj      (const void* linkreg, TraceId id, const void* ptr);
00155         static void TraceTestState(const void* linkreg, UINT16 testID, const void* str, UINT16 len);
00156         
00157     protected:
00158         static TraceMask g_globalMask;
00159         
00160         InternalTracer() {};
00161         
00162         static unsigned char NestedLevel();
00163         static const void* CallStackAdr(INT16 level);
00164         
00165     private:
00166         struct DataTraceHeader {
00167             TraceHeader h;
00168             const void* traceHelperAdr;
00169         };
00170         
00171         struct TraceMessageData {
00172             TraceHeader h;
00173             UINT16 message_id;
00174         };
00175 
00176         struct AttachData {
00177             const void* app;
00178             const void* container;
00179             UINT8 appId;
00180             WCHAR appName[APP_NAME_LENGTH];
00181         };
00182         
00183         struct DetachData {
00184             const void* app;
00185             UINT8 appId;
00186         };
00187         
00188         struct NewData {
00189             const void* adr1;
00190             const void* ptr;
00191             UINT16 size;
00192         };
00193         
00194         struct DelData {
00195             const void* adr1;
00196             const void* ptr;
00197         };
00198         
00199         struct TestStateData {
00200             TraceHeader h;
00201             UINT16 testID;
00202         };
00203         
00204         // don't allow cloning
00205         InternalTracer(const InternalTracer&);
00206         InternalTracer& operator=(const InternalTracer&);
00207         
00208         // don't allow creating on heap
00209         void* operator new(size_t size);
00210         void operator delete(void* ptr);
00211         
00212 };  // Tracer
